definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: His skis crossed and he sat down in a most undignified manner.
sentences.chinese: 交叉在一起坐下時，姿勢很不雅觀。

sentences.english: It's not nice to pick your nose.
It is unsightly and this can reflect on the efficiency of their work.
sentences.chinese: 這是非常不雅觀，同時這也反映出他們的工作效率。

sentences.english: What is the best way to see that district?
sentences.chinese: 不雅觀賞該地區最好的體例是什麼？

sentences.english: Studies on the microeconomics and pricing of bancassurance products are sparse.
sentences.chinese: 微不雅觀經濟學研究的銀行保險產物和價格的稀疏。

sentences.english: All visitors to the site must wear safety helmet.
sentences.chinese: 到工地的所有參不雅觀者必需帶上安全帽。

sentences.english: They learn responsibility and family values as they grow up.
sentences.chinese: 在成長的過程中，他們學會了責任和家庭價值不雅觀。

sentences.english: Do you know what Guanlan is famous for in the world?
sentences.chinese: 你知道不雅觀瀾有什麼在世界聞名？

sentences.english: He is awkward in his gait.
The Pyramids were among the seven wonders of the world.
sentences.chinese: 古埃及大金字塔是世界七大奇不雅觀之一。

sentences.english: But then you'll miss the magnificent view.
sentences.chinese: 可是，你會因此錯過那絢麗無比的景不雅觀。

sentences.english: Computer wires behind the desk are very messy as well.
sentences.chinese: 電腦的電線也是十分的零亂，一點都不雅觀。

sentences.english: We'll walk over to the White House for a visit.
sentences.chinese: 我們步輦兒到白宮不雅觀賞吧。

sentences.english: Exchange of food or division of food in public is bad taste.
sentences.chinese: 在衆人面前交換食物或將食物分半是不雅觀的。

sentences.english: He will show the woman around Baltimore.
sentences.chinese: 他將領女士參不雅觀巴爾的摩。

sentences.english: Would you like to come to our factory for a visit?
sentences.chinese: 您寧願答應到我們廠來不雅觀賞嗎？
